short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides that CHEEKY ANNOYING Sign Out button on YouTube

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Did you ever find yourself in the situation of switching your dear account and your mouse click went over the sign out button thus LOGGING YOU OUT OF EVERY SINGLE GOOGLE ACCOUNT AND WASTING YEARS OF YOUR LIFE???

Well, seek no more! This extension will fix your life, your accounts, your marriage, your problems, your affairs, your depression and everything in between! This is the solution to all of your life's problems. It removes that pesky Sign Out button when changing accounts you can accidentally click.

DISCLAIMER: This description is intended to both explain what this extension does and be humorous. Do not take anything said not related to the extension seriously!
